definition: honor does not allow one to glance back (idiom); duty-bound not to turn back/no surrender/to pursue justice with no second thoughts
justice/righteousness/meaning/foster (father etc)/adopted/artificial (tooth, limb etc)/relationship/friendship
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
surname Gu
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to

sentences.chinese: 沉溺在你的世界，义无反顾。

sentences.english: Does directs this line, means that clenches the teeth and is duty-bound not to turn back.
sentences.chinese: 干上导演这一行，就意味着咬紧牙关和义无反顾。

sentences.english: Waiting for love, the person who is waiting is always devil-may-care .
sentences.chinese: 为爱情而等待，等待的人往往会义无反顾。

sentences.english: In years past, I could have ventured forth with no concern for my safety.
sentences.chinese: 多年前，我曾四次义无反顾的去哪里探险。

sentences.english: When it comes to giving, some people stop at nothing.
sentences.chinese: 当需要给予的时候，一些人倾其所有，义无反顾。

definition: without hesitation/resolutely/firmly
to dash on bravely with no thought of personal safety (idiom); undaunted by dangers/regardless of perils
to glance back/fig. to regret/to have second thoughts about sth
reckless/regardless of everything
no complaints/to have no regrets
without the slightest hesitation
firmly/resolutely/without hesitation
see 一往無前|一往无前[yi1 wang3 wu2 qian2]
unswerving/unflinching
to advance dauntlessly in wave upon wave (idiom)
the moth flies into the flame/fatal attraction
bravery with no thought of personal safety (idiom); risking life and limb/undaunted by perils
to advance bravely
to advance courageously (idiom)/to press forward
one falls, the next follows (idiom); stepping into the breach to replace fallen comrades/advancing wave upon wave
delighted to (do sth, idiom)/perfectly happy to do/most willing to do
